title: Ariel Winter shares a hug with Levi Meaden while outside an LA studio amid breakup rumors
text:
She reportedly split from her boyfriend after three years together.

Yet Ariel Winter and Levi Meaden were spotted getting close again Sunday as the possibly former couple departed a studio in North Hollywood.

The 21–year–old Modern Family star and the 32–year–old Pacific Rim: Uprising actor shared a tender hug outside before going their separate ways.

Back at it? Ariel Winter, 21, and Levi Meaden, 32, were spotted getting close again Sunday as the possible exes departed a studio in North Hollywood

Ariel was dressed casually in a gray long-sleeve shirt dotted with dark paint flecks.

The 5ft1in paired her top with a pair of black leggings culminating in a pair of white sneakers.

Her raven tresses were held up in a messy bun and she carried along a handful of mail.

She added a splash of color to the neutral ensemble with her striking crimson nails.

No fuss: Ariel was dressed casually in a gray long-sleeve shirt dotted with dark paint flecks, which she paired with simple black leggings

Seeing red: Her raven tresses were held up in a messy bun and she added a splash of color to the neutral ensemble with her striking crimson nails

Levi rocked a similarly casual look with a collarless burgundy shirt he left mostly unbuttoned.

The Canadian actor wore a pair of black jeans and paired them with a set of rugged black boots.

Ariel began her relationship with Levi, more than a decade her senior, back in November 2016.

Their rendezvous Sunday marked their first public sighting together since August.

Though they clearly seemed close, the chaste hug doesn't necessarily portend a restart to their relationship.

Low key: Levi rocked a similarly casual look with a collarless burgundy shirt he left mostly unbuttoned

Ancient history: Ariel began her relationship with Levi, more than a decade her senior, back in November 2016

The Sofia The First actress clearly wasn't letting the breakup blues get to her as she stepped out for lunch with a friend at The Henry in West Hollywood on Wednesday.

She looked cute and casual as she showed off her toned figure while paying for her car at valet and heading about her day.

The actress showed off a bit more skin in a white crop top that highlighted her fit tummy and pierced navel.

Not sweating it: Ariel didn't appear to be suffering from the breakup blues earlier this week when she grabbed lunch with a friend

Ariel and the Breaking Bad alum had been dating since she was just 18 years old after being spotted out in November 2016.

Last week, rumors began to swirl that the two were no longer together after she was seen grabbing a bite to eat with another man at Kiwami in Studio City.

The single life has surely come to a shock to the young TV actress who confirmed she was living with her beau while on Jimmy Kimmel Live! in May 2017.

'My boyfriend and I live together, and he cooks…he takes care of all the handy stuff and all that,' she said while on the show.

Moving on? Last week, rumors began to swirl that the two were no longer together after she was seen grabbing a bite to eat with another man at Kiwami in Studio City

Last week, Us Weekly seemingly confirmed the couple's breakup, though Ariel didn't publicly comment and no sources were quoted confirming the split.

The comic actress has been keeping busy as she continues to film the last season of her series, Modern Family.

Ariel joined the original cast back in 2009 for its first season.

No details: Last week, Us Weekly seemingly confirmed the couple's breakup, though Ariel didn't publicly comment and no sources were quoted confirming the split

Serious squats: She took to her social media recently to show off how she's been getting that toned figure of her with some intense looking squats

Leg day: The actress looked focused as she worked on toning up her legs in the gym

Ariel and Levi were criticized by some fans for their 11-year age difference, especially considering that she had only just turned 18 when they first got together.

'I'm happy, and whatever people want to say, they can say. I don't understand why someone would even comment on our situation at all. I don't think it's that big of a deal,' she said of the age difference to Refinery29.

'There are tons of people of all ages that live with their boyfriend. I'm super happy in the arrangement that we have. We love living together. It's just great.'

Together, the two shared three dogs and a rabbit. Neither Ariel or Levi have spoken out about the break-up.

Beauty: Ariel shared this photo to her Instagram looking chic in a white tank top and an intense winged eyeliner look

It's over: Levi Meaden and Ariel smile together at the InStyle and Warner Bros Golden Globes After Party back in January
description: Ariel Winter was spotted Sunday sharing a hug with her ex Levi Meaden. The Modern Family star and her actor beau reportedly broke up after three years together and haven't been seen in public in months.
